div.p: There’s probably two actually it’s the stress when you are at full capacity, you’re working hard, you’re trying to get everything smooth
that’s very difficult physically and mentally and then also if I mess up, get an order wrong or something that’s quite hard for me to deal with
personally because I want the best for the business and the customers so I find that very hard. The thing I least like about the work is
probably washing up, I absolutely hate washing up, because we’re an Old English Tea Room all our china is antiques, 60 or 70 years old we use
so all of it has to be washed by hand and at the end of the day gubbins here gets to wash up...
